name: Laser Eraser
description:
Erase enemies with your laser. 

Erase many enemies in one shot to get a health bonus!

Made in 3h for Trijam #190

Controls: WASD/Arrow keys, LMB/Space

Credits: 

Background tile: 711 studios

Font: Dogica Pixel by Roberto Mocci

Other essential help: Callooom
